title: Aggregated U.S. Housing Prices (City-State-Year)
description: City-level aggregation of U.S. housing prices derived from Redfin ZIP Code Market Tracker data and merged with SimpleMaps ZIP–City mapping. Each record represents the average median sale price for a city and year, along with the number of contributing ZIP codes.

columns.avg_price: Average median sale price across ZIP codes in the city
columns.zip_count: Number of ZIP codes contributing to the average

preservation.format_durability: CSV and JSON formats ensure long-term readability
